select a.id as id ,a.name_ as name ,a.code_ as code, a.org_code_ as orgCode,b.id_,b.full_name_ as fullName,b.short_name_ as shortName, case when a.type_ ='01' then '合同工A' when a.type_ ='02' then '合同工B' when a.type_ ='03' then '合同工C' when a.type_ ='04' then '合同工D' when a.type_ ='05' then '合同工E' when a.type_ ='06' then '合同工F' else '合同工G' end as type
from t_teller_info_ a inner join adm_agency_ b on a.ORG_CODE_=b.id_
